title: HAP 101 - Crossing Paths - the Last Years of Malcolm X and Martin Luther King Jr
itunes:title: HAP 101 - Crossing Paths - the Last Years of Malcolm X and Martin Luther King Jr
description: After 1963, the views of Malcolm X and MLK came closer together, on topics including internationalism, political engagement, and economics.
